articles.title: Edge Zero Launches Grid Visibility Solution to Support Labor Party's Home Battery Initiative
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: A new program equips distribution system operators with real-time data tools. This supports a scaled home battery rollout in Australia.

articles.title: Palermo partners on new Ragu frozen pizzas
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Ragu is launching an extension to its sauce lineup. This marks a new addition to the company's existing range of products.

articles.title: 'No more stiff neck': These cooling pillows are down to a record-low $19 a pair
articles.summary: Utopia Bedding is offering its Gusseted Pillows at a discounted price on Amazon. These pillows are designed with a gusseted construction for added height and structure, filled with 950-gram poly fiber, and feature a breathable outer shell. Customer reviews highlight the pillows' comfort, support, and ability to stay cool during sleep.

articles.title: Pinterest Rolls Out Enhanced Visual Search Features
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Pinterest is enhancing its visual search capabilities with new tools that allow users to segment Pin images for more relevant product discovery. These tools, powered by generative AI, include refinement options based on style, color, and occasion. The updated search tools are initially available for women's fashion content in the U.K., U.S., and Canada, with plans for future expansion.

articles.title: Nutribullet Portable Blender review: Make milkshakes, smoothies and cocktails on the go
articles.author: Joanne Gould
articles.summary: Nutribullet has launched the Nutribullet Portable Blender, a personal-sized, USB-C rechargeable blender designed for on-the-go use. The blender is marketed for smoothies, protein shakes, and iced lattes, and is claimed to be capable of blending ice, frozen fruit, and nuts.

articles.title: New Method Cleaners joins Chamber rolls
articles.author: Callie Jones
articles.summary: New Method Cleaners, a laundry and dry cleaning service, is under new ownership since November. The business offers various services, including laundry, dry cleaning, cowboy starching, wedding dress preservation, and seamstress services, serving areas in eastern Colorado, southwest Nebraska, and western Kansas. They also provide drive-through and delivery options.

articles.title: B2B Companies Can Now Search Verified Local Leads With Targetron's New Directory Platform
articles.summary: Targetron launched its new B2B Local Leads Directory, which is a searchable tool designed to streamline regional B2B prospecting. The new product provides access to verified local business data, enabling users to search companies by location, category, or keyword and download leads for outreach.

articles.title: Inside Bubble Skincare: Shai Eisenman's mission to make high-quality beauty affordable
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: Bubble Skincare, founded in 2020, offers affordable and effective skincare products. The product line includes Slam Dunk Hydrating Cream Moisturizer, Water Slide Hydration Boosting Serum, Day Dream Vitamin C + Niacinamide Serum, Fresh Start Gel Cleanser, Bounce Back Balancing Toner Mist and Over Night Hydrating Sleep Mask which are available at retailers like Walmart and Shoppers Drug Mart.

articles.title: Cerence AI and Code Factory Collaborate to Bring Voice-Powered Interaction to Self-Service Kiosks  May. 5, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: Cerence AI, in collaboration with Code Factory, is launching VoiceTopping, a new solution that brings conversational AI to self-service kiosks. VoiceTopping integrates embedded voice interaction technology into existing kiosks, allowing users to interact via voice, enhancing user experience and accessibility across various industries.

articles.title: Google has launched new film and TV production wing: Report
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Google aims to encourage creative community adoption of its newer technologies. The effort includes AI products and services such as the Immersive View feature, which allows users to see things in 3D.

articles.title: Cotton candy Sprite? What to know about McDonald's 'secret menu' item, how to order in Ohio
articles.author: Alex Perry
articles.summary: McDonald's is unofficially offering a new drink combination called 'Cotton Candy Sprite' via its 'secret menu' based on customer requests. This comes alongside recent official launches of items like lemonade, McCrispy chicken strips, and the return of Snack Wraps.

articles.title: Beyond the Classic: Bold & Flavorful Margaritas for Your Cinco Celebration
articles.author: Kristin Barclay
articles.summary: Various margarita recipes feature different brands of Tequila and Mezcal. Pantalones Organic Tequila is used in the Organic Margarita, Casamigos Tequila in the Casamigos Margarita, Ghost Tequila in the Spicy Watermelon Margarita, Astral Tequila in the Chili Mango Margarita and Very Berry Margarita, Teremana Tequila in the Pomegranate Margarita and the People's Margarita, Mezcal Union in the Hibiscus Margarita and the Paloma Viejo and Dulce Vida Tequila in the Coconut Lime Margarita and Shareable Frozen Margarita.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy new ‘impressive' air fryer dupe – and it's €125 cheaper
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland is selling the Salter Dual View 7L Air Fryer, a dupe of the Ninja Foodie Dual Zone Air Fryer, for a limited time at €74.99. The air fryer offers six cooking functions and energy savings. Aldi is also launching a vacuum stick this week for €59.99.

articles.title: Western Digital's leaked PCIe 5 SSD could be an utter speed demon
articles.author: Michael Crider
articles.summary: Western Digital is preparing to launch a new Gen 5 SSD. The drive boasts potential read speeds of 14.9 gigabytes per second.

articles.title: The best scented laundry detergents for 2025, tested and reviewed
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares several scented laundry detergents, including Gain Relax Detergent Pods in Dewdrop Dream, Gain Botanicals Liquid Detergent in White Tea & Lavender, Tide Sport with Febreze Liquid Detergent, Tide Plus Downy Liquid Detergent in April Fresh, Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Detergent Pods in Fresh Burst, Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Ultra Concentrated Liquid Detergent in Rain Water, Hex Performance Liquid Detergent in Fresh, L'Avant Collective High Performing Liquid Detergent in Fresh Linen, Seventh Generation Ultra Concentrated Liquid Detergent in Fresh Lavender, and BioKleen 3x Concentrated Liquid Detergent in Lavender Lily. The review assesses their scent, cleaning power, and other factors to determine the best options for consumers.

articles.title: New Moto Edge 70 leak suggests it will get a major camera upgrade
articles.author: Vishnu Sarangapurkar
articles.summary: A leak suggests Motorola is developing the Moto Edge 70, the successor to the Edge 60 series. The Edge 70 is expected to feature a similar design to the Edge 60, including curved edges, a vegan leather back, and a triple-camera system with a 50MP primary lens. Rumored specifications include a Dimensity 7000 series chip (likely the Dimensity 7400 SoC) and 12GB of RAM, with a potential launch around September 2024.

articles.title: HyperOS Is Here: What Xiaomi's New Operating System Means for You
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched HyperOS, a new operating system designed to power its entire ecosystem, replacing MIUI. HyperOS is built on Android and Xiaomi Vela, and features include HyperConnect for device interaction, smarter file system, real-time performance optimization, built-in AI, a fresh design, and improved privacy. The Xiaomi 14 series launched with HyperOS, and updates have been rolled out to other devices, including the Xiaomi SU7 EV.

articles.title: Google is heading to Hollywood to upgrade its star power
articles.summary: Google has launched a new film and TV production initiative called "100 Zeros" in partnership with Range Media Partners. The initiative aims to fund or produce projects that promote a positive view of Google's products, particularly Android, and technology in general, with product placement being a secondary goal. The success of "100 Zeros" will be judged by its impact on popular sentiment around Google's products and services.

articles.title: 'I wore Oodie's new pyjamas for a fortnight and I'm desperate to buy more'
articles.author: Narin Flanders
articles.summary: Oodie has launched a new line of pyjamas featuring both cooling and warming options. The cooling pyjamas are made from a modal blend fibre, while the warming versions are crafted from a brushed bamboo blend. Oodie is offering 20 per cent off when shoppers buy two pieces of the temperature regulating range.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 10 confirmed to launch in India soon: 5 things we know so far
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: iQOO is preparing to launch its latest Neo series smartphone, the iQOO Neo 10, in India soon, with availability confirmed on Amazon India and the official iQOO online store. The Neo 10 is expected to feature a 6.78-inch FHD+ 1.5K AMOLED display, a dual-camera setup including a 50MP primary sensor, and is powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset with a 7,000mAh battery and 120W fast charging.

articles.title: Lava's New Yuva Star 2 Brings 5000mAh Battery for Under ₹6,500
articles.author: Republic World
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Yuva Star 2, a new smartphone featuring a 6.75-inch HD+ display, 4GB RAM (expandable to 8GB), 64GB internal storage, a 13MP dual AI camera, and a 5000mAh battery. The phone is priced at ₹6,499 and runs Android 14 (Go edition).

articles.title: X'clusive Looks Launches Premium Beard and Skincare Brand Beard Sauce
articles.author: X’clusive Looks
articles.summary: X'clusive Looks, founded by Marcinda Hankins, launched Beard Sauce, a skincare innovation designed to treat both facial hair and the skin beneath. The product addresses dryness, irritation, and breakage with a hydrating formula, crafted with natural ingredients like honey, suitable for all ethnicities and skin types.

articles.title: Latest Samsung Galaxy A-Series 5G phones price in Pakistan
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy A56 5G, Galaxy A36 5G, and Galaxy A26 5G in Lahore, Pakistan, on April 12th. The new Galaxy A series has AI powered features, enhanced displays, powerful batteries and supports up to six generations of OS upgrades and six years of security updates. The phones are available in stores and online, with prices starting at Rs. 84,999 for the Galaxy A26 5G.

articles.title: Geniushub Launches 1-Hour Marketing Consultation to Help Hong Kong SMEs Seize Digital Opportunities
articles.summary: Geniushub has launched a 1-hour marketing consultation service to assist small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in Hong Kong with digital transformation. The service offers tailored recommendations on advertising budget planning, platform selection, content strategies, and marketing approaches, leveraging insights from the 《Digital 2025: Hong Kong》report.

articles.title: Geniushub Launches 1-Hour Marketing Consultation to Help Hong Kong SMEs Seize Digital Opportunities
articles.author: Genius Hub Technology Co. Ltd
articles.summary: Geniushub is offering digital marketing services to help SMEs capitalize on digital transformation opportunities. The company invites businesses to schedule a consultation for embracing the new wave of digital marketing in 2025.

articles.title: Suzy Founder & CEO Matt Britton Launches Generation AI
articles.summary: Suzy's Founder & CEO, Matt Britton, is launching his book "Generation AI" on May 6, 2025. The book aims to provide a blueprint for embracing AI's opportunities while ensuring an equitable impact. Early readers can sign up for launch updates at GenerationAI.bot.

articles.title: Zoho launches AI capabilities in low-code development platform, Zoho Creator for faster, easier app creation
articles.author: Adeola Balogun
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation launched new services and features within Zoho Creator, its low-code application development platform. These include the CoCreator AI assistant, powered by Zia, which facilitates faster app building and Idea-to-App Generation feature that utilizes ZohoAI or OpenAI to develop full-fledged applications.  The new feature with AI Skills enables businesses to build apps with specialized skills that interpret natural language instructions in the business context and automate complex chains of actions intelligently.
FlexPress system, a new and unused product, is available for sale at $75.

articles.title: Newbook Launches "Essentials" Platform to Empower Smaller RV Parks and Campgrounds
articles.author: Newbook
articles.summary: Newbook, a Storable company, launched Newbook Essentials, a streamlined version of its campground management platform. This version is specifically designed for small RV parks and campgrounds, offering enterprise-grade power without the complexities typically associated with such systems.

articles.title: Airtel's B2B arm rolls-out 'Business Name Display' solution for enterprises
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Bharti Airtel's B2B arm launched 'Business Name Display' (BND), a solution enabling enterprises to display their brand name on recipient's mobile screens during outgoing calls.  Piloted with over 250 businesses, the service aims to increase customer engagement and distinguish legitimate business calls from spam.

articles.title: - Living In China Without Mandarin? Patience & Technology Go A Long Way
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Several digital tools and apps like Google Translate, WeChat, Baidu Maps, AMAP, Meituan, DiDi, and Alipay are useful and essential for navigating daily life in China. These tools and services offer features that help bridge communication gaps, provide translation, facilitate payments, offer navigation, and make food delivery and ride-hailing easier, making it easier to live in China even for people who do not speak Mandarin.

articles.title: Lava Yuva Star 2 budget phone with Android Go launched in India at ₹6499
articles.summary: Lava launched the Lava Yuva Star 2, a budget-friendly smartphone with a 5,000mAh battery, octa-core UNISOC processor, and Android 14 Go. It features a 6.75-inch HD+ display, a dual camera setup, and is priced at Rs. 6,499. iQOO has also confirmed the upcoming launch of the Neo 10 in India.

articles.title: Next shoppers hail dress that 'skims over your tum' and is 'ideal for summer'
articles.author: Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: Next is offering the Linen Scoop Back Mini Shift Dress in six styles with prices ranging from £24 to £38. Urban Outfitters has the Light Before Dark Bex Printed Midi Slip Dress on sale for £42, down from £62. Both dresses are designed for summer wear and have received positive customer reviews.

articles.title: Google Ad Network Showing Ads in Chats With Some Third-Party AI Chatbots, Says Report
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Google is introducing AdSense features to third-party AI chatbots, displaying ads during conversations. This expansion of Google's advertising network, initially tested with AI search startups like iAsk and Liner, aims to maintain competitiveness in the digital advertising space as generative AI grows. The goal is to enable websites to show relevant ads in their conversational AI experiences.

articles.title: Elo Unveils the I-Series 5 for Android and Backpack 5 for Android
articles.author: Elo
articles.summary: Elo launched the I-Series 5 for Android, I-Series 5 Slate for Android and Backpack 5 products. These next-generation devices provide enhanced interaction, performance and flexibility marking a significant leap forward for point-of-sale, self-service and industrial applications.

articles.title: SonicWall Redefines Cybersecurity, Sets New Standard with Next Generation Network Security Solutions Built for MSPs
articles.author: Sonic WALL
articles.summary: SonicWall introduced a suite of products and services on May 5, 2025, designed for Managed Service Providers (MSPs), offering end-to-end cyber protection. The unveiling includes new next-generation mid-range and high-end firewalls (NGFW) tailored for medium-sized businesses, featuring embedded advanced threat protection.

articles.title: Neptune Software Announces Strategic Shift: Building the AI-Powered Enterprise for SAP and Beyond
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Neptune Software announced a new strategic direction focused on clean core SAP modernization, cloud transformation, and enterprise-ready AI with its 2025 roadmap. The company is emphasizing simplicity, agility, and customer value, aiming to empower enterprises to build solutions with greater speed and control in the AI era. Neptune Software's mission is to help companies adopt, evolve, and own AI, providing a foundation for future-proofing their business for SAP and beyond.

articles.title: Airtel Launches Industry First ‘Business Name Display' Feature To Curb Spam and Build Customer Trust for Enterprises
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Airtel Business introduced 'Business Name Display' (BND), an industry-first feature that displays a company's brand name on recipients' mobile screens during calls to enhance trust and prevent spam confusion. Reliance Jio unveiled 'AI Photo Play' on Jio AI Cloud at WAVES Summit 2025, enabling users to create realistic AI avatars and customize themes.

articles.title: New 'dreamy' Joules midi dress that's 'evocative of lazy summer days' and £65 at Next
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Joules has introduced a new 'dreamy' Sophia Black Ruffle Shoulder Midi Dress, priced at £65, available at Next. The dress features a black and cream print with flowers, birds, trees, and hot air balloons, and is available in sizes six to 26.

articles.title: Morgan Supersport: A New Era
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Morgan is introducing the Supersport, marking a 'New Era' for the company. The specifics of this product launch are not detailed, but the announcement indicates the release of a new model or significant update.

articles.title: Holland & Barrett set to make change across UK stores after Martin Lewis' MSE warning
articles.author: Hannah Ahmed
articles.summary: Holland & Barrett is implementing changes to its Subscribe & Save program following an investigation that revealed the subscription service sometimes costs more than one-off purchases. The retailer has removed the option to subscribe to certain items and will review the program to ensure promotional offers benefit subscription customers while also clarifying the scheme's promotional language and terms.

articles.title: Redmi Note 14 Series: Living up to the hype
articles.author: Dawn
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Redmi Note 14 series, generating market buzz. The series features upgraded camera and chipset along with surprising additional features.

articles.title: AI Cannot Hallucinate Nor Lie
articles.author: William M Briggs
articles.summary: OpenAI has recently launched new AI models, o3 and o4-mini, that exhibit increased 'hallucination' tendencies compared to previous models. These models, designed for reasoning, sometimes produce incorrect outputs, presenting a challenge for users relying on their accuracy.

articles.title: Polytron Electric Car Launches Tomorrow, May 6, 2025: Peek Into Its Price & Spec Leaks!
articles.author: Sandra Ruth Ferani
articles.summary: Polytron is launching its first electric car in Indonesia on May 6, 2025, marking its expansion into the EV market. This move is supported by a strategic partnership with Skyworth Auto and aims to provide an attractive EV option for Indonesian families, with projected prices between Rp 300 million and Rp 400 million.

articles.title: 'I tried Oodie's cooling pyjamas during the mini heatwave to see if they really work for summer'
articles.author: Léonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Oodie has launched a new pyjama collection featuring five models in cooling and warming versions, priced from £35 to £39. The cooling range uses a modal blend fibre, and the warming range uses a brushed bamboo blend. Initial customer feedback suggests the new Oodie line is already popular.

articles.title: Hoover's 'most powerful cordless vacuum' has £140 off
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Hoover is offering a significant discount on its HF9 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, reducing the price from £249 to £109 with the code POWERFUL. The HF9 features anti-hair wrap technology, adaptable brush settings for various floor types, and a 30-minute battery life, positioning it as a competitor to Shark and Dyson vacuums.

articles.title: L'Oréal Paris Celebrates the Groundbreaking Launch of MELASYL at the Iconic Museum of the Future
articles.author: Eye
articles.summary: L'Oréal Paris unveiled Melasyl, a new skincare formula designed to treat pigmentation, at the Museum of the Future. Melasyl aims to prevent pigmentation at its source.

articles.title: Pizza Punks Newcastle new lunch menu is a Fusion of Flavour!
articles.author: clare graham
articles.summary: Pizza Punks has launched a new lunch menu featuring affordable options like 18' NY slices from £4.50 and 12' sourdough pizzas and Sandoughs for £9.95, available Monday to Friday, 12pm-4pm. The menu includes unique items like the Hawaiirn-Bru pizza and various Sandough combinations, designed to offer exceptional value without compromising quality.

articles.title: Edge 70 Pro difference
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Edge 60 globally. Early leaks suggest information about it is available.

articles.title: China's answer to Autodesk, Manycore, bets on AI for a future of ‘spatial intelligence'
articles.author: Wency Chen
articles.summary: Manycore Tech offers spatial design platforms Kujiale, KuSpace, and Coohom, enabling designers to create detailed interior layouts with 3D elements, construction blueprints, lighting systems, and electrical plans rendered in real time. These tools serve customers in over 200 markets and had 2.7 million monthly active users in 2023.

articles.title: Tim Hortons partners with actor Ryan Reynolds on breakfast boxes
articles.author: Tara Deschamps
articles.summary: Ryan Reynolds is featured in an advertisement for a new Tim Horton's product. This suggests the launch or introduction of a new item by Tim Horton's.

articles.title: ரெனோ டஸ்டர் அடிப்படையிலான நிஸான் காம்பேக்ட் எஸ்யூவி.. எப்போது அறிமுகமாகிறது?
articles.summary: Nissan is anticipated to soon debut a new compact SUV worldwide. This new SUV is based on the Renault Duster.

articles.title: Lava launches Yuva Star 2 smartphone in sub-₹10,000 price segment
articles.author: ETTelecom
articles.summary: Lava launched its new smartphone, the Lava Yuva Star 2, priced at ₹6,499. The smartphone features a 6.75-inch HD+ display, a 5000mAh battery, Android 14 Go OS, a 13MP AI dual rear camera and a 5MP front camera. It is powered by an octa-core Unisoc chipset coupled with 4GB RAM and 64GB internal memory.

articles.title: Airtel's B2B arm launches ‘Business Name Display' solution for enterprises
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Bharti Airtel's B2B arm has launched 'Business Name Display' (BND), a new service enabling enterprises to display their brand name on recipients' mobile screens during outgoing calls. This solution aims to enhance customer engagement and build trust by helping customers distinguish legitimate business calls.

articles.title: NLB Services Launches BrandPipal Targets 20X Growth and 25 Million Dollar Revenue in 5 Years
articles.author: Neel Achary
articles.summary: NLB Services launched BrandPipal, a full-service marketing and employer branding firm, to expand its services and cater to the evolving marketing needs of global clients. BrandPipal aims to integrate creativity, technology, and data to deliver impactful campaigns, targeting sectors like GCCs, B2B enterprises, and technology startups.

articles.title: Elevating Brands with Heart and Strategy: Vagisha Jain's Vision for Modern Marketing
articles.summary: VagishaJain.com has expanded its service offerings to include virtual reality and VR interior design solutions, catering to immersive brand storytelling. Additionally, the company now provides ecommerce product shoot solutions and has introduced celebrity branding and endorsement services. The agency also functions as a website development company with expertise in ecommerce platforms like Shopify.

articles.title: NLB Services expands business portfolio with the launch of BrandPipal; Targets 20X growth with revenue target of USD 25 Million in the next five years
articles.author: Naman Bansal
articles.summary: NLB Services has launched BrandPipal, a full-service marketing and employer branding firm, to expand its service offerings beyond talent and workforce solutions. BrandPipal will offer integrated marketing services, targeting Global Capability Centers (GCC), B2B enterprises, and Technology Start-Ups, with an aim to deliver data-fueled campaigns and strategic storytelling.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 10 design and key features officially teased on Amazon; India launch imminent
articles.summary: iQOO is preparing to launch the iQOO Neo 10 in India, which will be available on Amazon. The phone is rumored to have a dual-chip configuration including a Snapdragon 8s Gen4 SoC and an in-house Q1 independent graphics chip for enhanced gaming performance. Specifications may include a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, a 50MP main camera, a 7,000mAh battery with 120W fast charging and IP65 dust and water resistance.

articles.title: Sudden Samsung update may make you regret buying the Galaxy S25
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung is potentially launching a new Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone. The device is remarkably thin at 5.8mm and features a dual-lens camera, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a 6.6-inch screen. Samsung is offering £100 off for customers who pre-order with a £50 deposit before May 9th.

articles.title: 'This £15 viral hair oil is actually worth the hype - my hair looks fuller in just a month'
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: Hair Syrup, created by Lucie McLeod, gained popularity on TikTok. The brand's popular product, Rapunzel pre-wash oil, contains ingredients like pink grapefruit, flaxseed, and pomegranate. A user tested Rapunzel oil and noticed shinier, softer, and fuller hair with consistent use.

articles.title: Surprise Android boost confirmed by Google and it's coming this month
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Google will preview Android 16 on May 13, 2025, preceding its I/O developer conference. Android 16 is likely to extend the redesign introduced with Android 12, and may include an updated photo picker UI, camera performance improvements, and better privacy functions.

articles.title: Elon Musk Changes His X Account Name to ‘Gorklon Rust'; Know What Does It Mean
articles.author: Deepak Gharai
articles.summary: xAI's AI chatbot 'Grok' has an upcoming version called 'Grok 3.5' that outperforms 'Grok 3', 'Gemini 2.5 Pro', and 'o3' based on leaked benchmark results. Elon Musk, seemingly related to the AI Chatbot launch, changed his display name on X to 'Gorklon Rust', possibly referencing the 'Grok' AI Chatbot and the Rust programming language used in xAI's technical infrastructure.

articles.title: Nairobi positioned  as testbed for innovations targeting African markets
articles.author: MARTIN MWITA
articles.summary: Calla PR launched "Try it in Nairobi," a service that allows businesses to test new products and services in a live market setting in Nairobi before scaling to the rest of Africa. The service aims to reduce the high failure rate of new product launches by providing access to real users, pilot locations, and partners for market validation and feedback.

articles.title: Lumio Vision 9 TV Review: A Bold Debut
articles.author: Manas Tiwari
articles.summary: Lumio, a new TV brand in India, has launched the Lumio Vision 7 and Lumio Vision 9 smart TVs. The Lumio Vision 9 is a 55-inch MiniLED TV featuring 900 nits of peak brightness, precise color tuning, and a Google TV experience. It also offers a Boss processor with a TLDR app experience for personalized music and sports.

articles.title: Why Nothing's CMF Phone 2 Pro has the potential to make smartphones fun again
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Nothing has launched the CMF Phone 2 Pro, a budget smartphone with modular elements, building upon the design of the CMF Phone 1. The CMF Phone 2 Pro introduces features like screw-on accessories, a 6.77-inch AMOLED display, and a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Pro 5G chipset, with a focus on bringing novelty and fun back to the smartphone experience.

articles.title: Samsung introduces Galaxy XCover7 Pro and Galaxy Tab Active5 Pro: Ruggedized devices for frontline excellence
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has announced the launch of the Galaxy XCover7 Pro and Galaxy Tab Active5 Pro, ruggedized devices aimed at frontline workers. These devices feature enhanced durability, improved performance, 5G connectivity, and extended battery life with the XCover7 Pro featuring a 4,350mAh battery and the Tab Active5 Pro a 10,100mAh battery along with hot-swap functionality. The Tab Active5 Pro features front-facing NFC Tagging and is designed for industries like retail, government, logistics, healthcare and manufacturing.

articles.title: Paper Moose launches creative testing tool
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Paper Moose has launched Moose Review, a hybrid testing tool using human and AI data to pre-test creative concepts. This is Paper Moose's first flagship product aimed at providing qualitative pre-testing quickly and cost-effectively. The tool allows brands to gain diverse opinions and insights in minutes.

articles.title: The Roku Channel is free, and you don't need a Roku device to watch
articles.author: James Barber
articles.summary: Roku offers the Roku Channel, a free streaming service accessible via web browsers, mobile apps (Android and iOS), and other streaming devices and smart TVs (excluding LG and Apple TV natively). The Roku Channel features free ad-supported TV channels, on-demand movies and TV series, live linear TV, and Roku's original programming, including 'Weird: The Al Yankovic Story'.

articles.title: Humble sweet potatoes revamp life in Guizhou
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Chen Shu brand is introducing sour and spicy instant noodles made of sweet potatoes. The new product is available at Freshippo, Alibaba's upscale chain in Shanghai.

articles.title: Google Pixel 9a review: Midrange monster
articles.author: Christopher Fam
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 9a smartphone. The Pixel 9a features a 48-megapixel main shooter, a 5,100mAh battery with a claimed 30-hour battery life, and AI-powered features such as Best Take and Add Me. Google promises seven years of operating system support for the Pixel 9a.

articles.title: Marketing to machines: When bots become the target audience
articles.summary: Netcore Cloud launched nine agentic AI agents designed to autonomously build hyper-personalized marketing campaigns. These AI agents specialize in functions like journey orchestration, content generation, and analytics. Unilever and H&M are also leveraging AI, using Nvidia Omniverse to create digital twins for marketing and product imagery.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge specs and pricing leaked ahead of May 13 launch
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge, anticipated to be available in China and Korea by May 23 and other markets by May 30. The device will feature a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, 12GB of RAM, and storage options of 256GB or 512GB, with pricing starting at €1,249. The phone is expected to feature a 200MP main sensor and run One UI 7 based on Android 15.

articles.title: Primark's 'gamechanger' fold-away backpack that 'combines style with function'
articles.author: Mel King Content Editor
articles.summary: Primark has launched a fold-away backpack designed for unexpected shopping trips and travel. The backpack is plain black, large enough to hold various items, and folds down into a smaller pouch. Initial customer feedback is mixed, with some praising its practicality and others reporting issues with the zipper and handle.

articles.title: Celebrate Family with Roborock: Special Gmarket Deals on Washer-Dryers This May
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Roborock is launching a limited-time promotion for its advanced washer-dryers on Gmarket from May 7 to 13. These washer-dryers feature Zeo-cycle™ moderate-temperature drying technology for delicate fabrics and TÜV-certified hygiene programs.

articles.title: Celebrate Family with Roborock: Special Gmarket Deals on Washer-Dryers This May
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
articles.summary: Roborock is launching a limited-time promotion on Gmarket from May 7 to 13, featuring its advanced washer-dryers, which include the Zeo-cycle™ moderate-temperature drying technology. The product line features models like the top-tier model with the RR Seafarer™ algorithm and a standard all-in-one model, as well as the compact M1 designed for small loads.

articles.title: DT Next Tech: Vivo Y19 5G offers 5500mAh battery and AI camera features for under Rs 13K
articles.author: Ashwin Rajagopalan
articles.summary: Vivo has launched the Vivo Y19 5G smartphone, a new entrant in the Rs 10-15K price band. Key features include a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor, a 13MP AI-boosted camera, a 6.74-inch HD+ LCD display with a 90Hz refresh rate, and a 5500 mAh battery. It is available in three storage variants and two color options, with an IP64 certification for dust and water resistance.
